程序包 controleur

类 ControleurGame

java.lang.Object
controleur.ControleurGame
public class ControleurGame
extends java.lang.Object
A class of Controller which communicates between Model and different View from users
从以下版本开始:
13 January 2021
版本:
%I%
作者:
WU Zhongyang, GUAN Mingjun
另请参阅:

  • 构造器详细资料

    • ControleurGame

      public ControleurGame​(Game g, javax.swing.JFrame frmShapeUp, java.awt.CardLayout card, javax.swing.JButton btnMode1, javax.swing.JButton btnMode2, javax.swing.JButton btnPlayCard, javax.swing.JButton btnMoveCard, javax.swing.JButton btnFrom, javax.swing.JButton btnTo, javax.swing.JButton btnOk, javax.swing.JLabel lbText, javax.swing.JButton btnPlayAgain)
      This is the constructor of the class ControleurGame.
      参数:
      g - The Object of the class Game from package carte.
      frmShapeUp - Frame of interface graphic.
      card - CardLayout from interface graphic.
      btnMode1 - Button for choosing mode 1 from interface graphic.
      btnMode2 - Button for choosing mode 2 from interface graphic.
      btnPlayCard - Button for placing the card in interface graphic.
      btnMoveCard - Button for moving the card in interface graphic.
      btnFrom - Button for confirming the departure of the card you want to move in interface graphic.
      btnTo - Button for confirming the arrival of the card you want to move to in interface graphic.
      btnOk - Button for confirming the end of your round.
      lbText - Label for hints.
      btnPlayAgain - Button for playing again.
